EmailTemplate.name: Event Updated With ICS (Host/Co-host)
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Organization.Name} - Registration update Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi <%attendeeName%>,
IMPORTANT: The following event has been updated.
<%updateSummary%> Event Name: {!Event.Subject} Date/Time: <%datetime%> Duration: {!Event.DurationInMinutes} min <%locationFields%> Event Capacity: <%capacity%> <%description%> <%serviceDetails%> <%locationDetails%>
Thank you, {!Organization.Name}
